verses.verse: וְהַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Now king דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> David זָקֵ֔ן <WH2204> was old בָּ֖א <WH935> [and] stricken בַּיָּמִ֑ים <WH3117> in years וַיְכַסֻּ֙הוּ֙ <WH3680> and they covered בַּבְּגָדִ֔ים <WH899> him with clothes וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> no יִחַ֖ם <WH3179> but he gat no heat לֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֧אמְרוּ <WH559> said ל֣וֹ עֲבָדָ֗יו <WH5650> Wherefore his servants יְבַקְשׁ֞וּ <WH1245> unto him Let there be sought לַאדֹנִ֤י <WH113> for my lord הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king נַעֲרָ֣ה <WH5291> a young בְתוּלָ֔ה <WH1330> virgin וְעָֽמְדָה֙ <WH5975> and let her stand לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וּתְהִי־ <WH1961> and become ל֖וֹ סֹכֶ֑נֶת <WH5532> and let her cherish וְשָׁכְבָ֣ה <WH7901> him and let her lie בְחֵיקֶ֔ךָ <WH2436> in thy bosom וְחַ֖ם <WH2552> may get heat לַאדֹנִ֥י <WH113> that my lord הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וַיְבַקְשׁוּ֙ <WH1245> So they sought נַעֲרָ֣ה <WH5291> damsel יָפָ֔ה <WH3303> for a fair בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> throughout all the coasts יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַֽיִּמְצְא֗וּ <WH4672> and found אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִישַׁג֙ <WH49> Abishag הַשּׁ֣וּנַמִּ֔ית <WH7767> a Shunammite וַיָּבִ֥אוּ <WH935> and brought אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> לַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> her to the king

וְהַֽנַּעֲרָ֖ה <WH5291> And the damsel יָפָ֣ה <WH3303> fair עַד־ <WH5704> against מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> [was] very וַתְּהִ֨י <WH1961> became לַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> the king סֹכֶ֙נֶת֙ <WH5532> and cherished וַתְּשָׁ֣רְתֵ֔הוּ <WH8334> and ministered וְהַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> to him but the king לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not יְדָעָֽהּ׃ <WH3045> knew

וַאֲדֹנִיָּ֧ה <WH138> Then Adonijah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חַגִּ֛ית <WH2294> of Haggith מִתְנַשֵּׂ֥א <WH5375> exalted לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> himself saying אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אֶמְלֹ֑ךְ <WH4427> I will be king וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> and he prepared ל֗וֹ רֶ֚כֶב <WH7393> him chariots וּפָ֣רָשִׁ֔ים <WH6571> and horsemen וַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> and fifty אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men רָצִ֥ים <WH7323> to run לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> had never עֲצָב֨וֹ <WH6087> had not displeased אָבִ֤יו <WH1> And his father מִיָּמָיו֙ <WH3117> him at any time לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> in saying מַדּ֖וּעַ <WH4069> Why כָּ֣כָה <WH3602> after that manner עָשִׂ֑יתָ <WH6213> Why hast thou done so וְגַם־ <WH1571> again ה֤וּא <WH1931> he טֽוֹב־ <WH2896> man תֹּ֙אַר֙ <WH8389> be drawn מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> ? and he also [was a] very וְאֹת֥וֹ <WH853> יָלְדָ֖ה <WH3205> [man] and [his mother] bare אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> him after אַבְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH53> Absalom

וַיִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become דְבָרָ֔יו <WH1697> And he conferred עִ֚ם <WH5973> with יוֹאָ֣ב <WH3097> with Joab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָ֔ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah וְעִ֖ם <WH5973> and with אֶבְיָתָ֣ר <WH54> and with Abiathar הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> the priest וַֽיַּעְזְר֔וּ <WH5826> helped אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> and they following אֲדֹנִיָּֽה׃ <WH138> Adonijah

וְצָד֣וֹק <WH6659> But Zadok הַ֠כֹּהֵן <WH3548> the priest וּבְנָיָ֨הוּ <WH1141> and Benaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֜ע <WH3077> of Jehoiada וְנָתָ֤ן <WH5416> and Nathan הַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> the prophet וְשִׁמְעִ֣י <WH8096> and Shimei וְרֵעִ֔י <WH7472> and Rei וְהַגִּבּוֹרִ֖ים <WH1368> and the mighty men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> which [belonged] to David לֹ֥א <WH3808> not הָי֖וּ <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲדֹנִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH138> were not with Adonijah

וַיִּזְבַּ֣ח <WH2076> slew אֲדֹנִיָּ֗הוּ <WH138> And Adonijah צֹ֤אן <WH6629> sheep וּבָקָר֙ <WH1241> and oxen וּמְרִ֔יא <WH4806> and fat cattle עִ֚ם <WH5973> by אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> by the stone הַזֹּחֶ֔לֶת <WH2120> of Zoheleth אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> which [is] by עֵ֣ין רֹגֵ֑ל <WH5883> Enrogel וַיִּקְרָ֗א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> all his brethren בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> sons הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> the men יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah עַבְדֵ֥י <WH5650> servants הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king's

וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> נָתָן֩ <WH5416> But Nathan הַנָּבִ֨יא <WH5030> the prophet וּבְנָיָ֜הוּ <WH1141> and Benaiah וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַגִּבּוֹרִ֛ים <WH1368> and the mighty men וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <WH8010> and Solomon אָחִ֖יו <WH251> his brother לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not קָרָֽא׃ <WH7121> he called

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake נָתָ֗ן <WH5416> Wherefore Nathan אֶל־ <WH413> about בַּת־ שֶׁ֤בַע <WH1339> unto Bathsheba אֵם־ <WH517> the mother שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> of Solomon לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not שָׁמַ֔עַתְּ <WH8085> Hast thou not heard כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> doth reign אֲדֹנִיָּ֣הוּ <WH138> that Adonijah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son חַגִּ֑ית <WH2294> of Haggith וַאֲדֹנֵ֥ינוּ <WH113> our lord דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> and David לֹ֥א <WH3808> does not יָדָֽע׃ <WH3045> knoweth

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> now לְכִ֛י <WH1980> come אִיעָצֵ֥ךְ <WH3289> give נָ֖א <WH4994> please עֵצָ֑ה <WH6098> counsel וּמַלְּטִי֙ <WH4422> that thou mayest save אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשֵׁ֔ךְ <WH5315> thine own life וְאֶת־ <WH853> נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> and the life בְּנֵ֖ךְ <WH1121> of thy son שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> Solomon

לְכִ֞י <WH1980> Go וּבֹ֣אִי ׀ <WH935> and get thee in אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> unto king דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> David וְאָמַ֤רְתְּ <WH559> and say אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אַתָּ֞ה <WH859> you אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> unto him Didst not thou my lord הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> O king נִשְׁבַּ֤עְתָּ <WH7650> swear לַאֲמָֽתְךָ֙ <WH519> unto thine handmaid לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Assuredly שְׁלֹמֹ֤ה <WH8010> Solomon בְנֵךְ֙ <WH1121> thy son יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <WH4427> shall reign אַחֲרַ֔י <WH310> after וְה֖וּא <WH1931> and he יֵשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> me and he shall sit עַל־ <WH5921> and כִּסְאִ֑י <WH3678> seat וּמַדּ֖וּעַ <WH4069> how מָלַ֥ךְ <WH4427> reign אֲדֹנִיָֽהוּ׃ <WH138> has Adonijah

הִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> Behold עוֹדָ֛ךְ <WH5750> are still מְדַבֶּ֥רֶת <WH1696> Behold while thou yet talkest שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there עִם־ <WH5973> with הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> there with the king וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אָב֣וֹא <WH935> I also will come in אַחֲרַ֔יִךְ <WH310> after וּמִלֵּאתִ֖י <WH4390> thee and confirm אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרָֽיִךְ׃ <WH1697> thy words

וַתָּבֹ֨א <WH935> went in בַת־ שֶׁ֤בֶע <WH1339> And Bathsheba אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> unto the king הַחַ֔דְרָה <WH2315> into the chamber וְהַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king זָקֵ֣ן <WH2204> old מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> was very וַֽאֲבִישַׁג֙ <WH49> and Abishag הַשּׁ֣וּנַמִּ֔ית <WH7767> the Shunammite מְשָׁרַ֖ת <WH8334> ministered אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> unto the king

וַתִּקֹּ֣ד <WH6915> bowed בַּת־ שֶׁ֔בַע <WH1339> And Bathsheba וַתִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <WH7812> and did obeisance לַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king מַה־ <WH4100> What לָּֽךְ׃

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And she said ל֗וֹ אֲדֹנִי֙ <WH113> unto him My lord אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> you נִשְׁבַּ֜עְתָּ <WH7650> thou swarest בַּֽיהוָ֤ה <WH3068> by the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God לַֽאֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <WH519> unto thine handmaid כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely שְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <WH8010> [saying] Assuredly Solomon בְנֵ֖ךְ <WH1121> thy son יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <WH4427> shall reign אַחֲרָ֑י <WH310> after וְה֖וּא <WH1931> and he יֵשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> me and he shall sit עַל־ <WH5921> upon כִּסְאִֽי׃ <WH3678> upon my throne

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> Now הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold אֲדֹנִיָּ֖ה <WH138> And now behold Adonijah מָלָ֑ךְ <WH4427> reigneth וְעַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> and now אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH113> and now my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָדָֽעְתָּ׃ <WH3045> thou knowest

וַ֠יִּזְבַּח <WH2076> And he hath slain שׁ֥וֹר <WH7794> oxen וּֽמְרִיא־ <WH4806> and fat cattle וְצֹאן֮ <WH6629> and sheep לָרֹב֒ <WH7230> in abundance וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> and hath called לְכָל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> all the sons הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king וּלְאֶבְיָתָר֙ <WH54> and Abiathar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וּלְיֹאָ֖ב <WH3097> and Joab שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> the captain הַצָּבָ֑א <WH6635> of the host וְלִשְׁלֹמֹ֥ה <WH8010> but Solomon עַבְדְּךָ֖ <WH5650> thy servant לֹ֥א <WH3808> has not קָרָֽא׃ <WH7121> hath he not called

וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> And thou my lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> O king עֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> the eyes כָל־ <WH3605> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of all Israel עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> and לְהַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> [are] upon thee that thou shouldest tell לָהֶ֔ם מִ֗י <WH4310> who יֵשֵׁ֛ב <WH3427> them who shall sit עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֥א <WH3678> on the throne אֲדֹנִֽי־ <WH113> of my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> after

וְהָיָ֕ה <WH1961> will come כִּשְׁכַ֥ב <WH7901> shall sleep אֲדֹנִֽי־ <WH113> Otherwise it shall come to pass when my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֑יו <WH1> with his fathers וְהָיִ֗יתִי <WH1961> will come אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I וּבְנִ֥י <WH1121> that I and my son שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> Solomon חַטָּאִֽים׃ <WH2400> shall be counted offenders

וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold עוֹדֶ֥נָּה <WH5750> was still מְדַבֶּ֖רֶת <WH1696> And lo while she yet talked עִם־ <WH5973> with הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> with the king וְנָתָ֥ן <WH5416> Nathan הַנָּבִ֖יא <WH5030> the prophet בָּֽא׃ <WH935> also came in

וַיַּגִּ֤ידוּ <WH5046> And they told לַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying הִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> Here נָתָ֣ן <WH5416> Behold Nathan הַנָּבִ֑יא <WH5030> the prophet וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> And when he was come in לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיִּשְׁתַּ֧חוּ <WH7812> he bowed לַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> himself before the king עַל־ <WH5921> with אַפָּ֖יו <WH639> with his face אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> to the ground

וַיֹּאמֶר֮ <WH559> said נָתָן֒ <WH5416> And Nathan אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> My lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> O king אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> have you אָמַ֔רְתָּ <WH559> hast thou said אֲדֹנִיָּ֖הוּ <WH138> Adonijah יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <WH4427> shall reign אַחֲרָ֑י <WH310> after וְה֖וּא <WH1931> and he יֵשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> me and he shall sit עַל־ <WH5921> and כִּסְאִֽי׃ <WH3678> seat
